overview: The adventures of the “Mating Season” gang continue as the clock is turned ahead two months. Hope's husband has passed away (he died while in the throes of an orgasm) and Hope is now dating James, the son of a very wealthy insurance broker. Tim has dumped Robin and has gone back to his wife Vicki, who discovers Polaroid pictures taken during our last episode. Vicki subsequently meets a hiker and has her own sweet revenge.
title: Sunny Side Up
